com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.extras
Class WPInflaterFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.extras.WPInflaterFactory

public final class WPInflaterFactory
extends java.lang.Object

WPInflaterFactory is a custom LayoutInflater.Factory for making XML inflation easier. Instead of prefixing a custom View with a fully qualified package name, ie. com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget you can instead use PREFIX.ClassName. This is a convenience class to make your XML cleaner.

Since:
07-15-2012

Method Detail

onCreateView

public View onCreateView(java.lang.String name,
                         Context context,
                         AttributeSet attrs)
This method maps PREFIX.ClassName to a class within any one of the PACKAGES. There are many instances where this method returns null, which means that Android will handle the inflation.
